DOC.criteria: The study population include woman stage IB1 cervical cancer ( histologic subtype ) deem eligible surgery , woman clinical stage I highgrade endometrial cancer plan undergo surgical staging . High grade define follow : Uterine serous carcinoma Clear cell endometrial carcinoma Grade 3 endometrioid carcinoma Endometrial carcinosarcoma Clinical stage I grade 12 endometrial cancer also eligible deep myoinvasion ≥ 50 % show preop MRI and/or elevate preop CA125 > 35 U/ml .
